name: Ahab's Mystical Wagon Adventures
description:
@FranklinsGhost

Made for Ludum Dare 36

You and your best friend, a donkey break down in the middle of nowhere while travelling to a town. 

Scene is unfinished so more of just clicking around and interacting with things. Or just talk to your best friend to pass the time while night rolls in.

Controls:

Click around to walk and on objects to look at them or interact with them.
